mapper.select: select * from sys_project sp order by sp.sort

select distinct p.* from sys_project p left join proj_role_relation r on p.id=r.proj_id where 1=1
and p.id=#{projId}
and p.proj_name like '%${projName}%'
order by p.sort asc

select distinct p.id from sys_project p ,proj_role_relation pr ,sys_role r ,sys_role_user ru ,sys_user u where p.id=pr.proj_id and pr.role_id=r.id and r.id=ru.roleId and u.id=ru.userId and u.username=#{username}
limit 1

select sp.id,sp.proj_name,sp.proj_code,sp.proj_intro,sp.sort,sp.createTime,sp.updateTime ,group_concat(distinct sr.id separator '、') as roleIds ,group_concat(distinct sr.name separator '、') as roleNames from sys_project sp left join proj_role_relation prr on sp.id=prr.proj_id left join sys_role sr on sr.id=prr.role_id where 1=1
and sp.id=#{map.projId}
and sp.proj_name like '%${map.projName}%'
and sp.createTime >= str_to_date(#{map.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and sp.createTime <= str_to_date(#{map.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and sp.createTime between str_to_date(#{map.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and str_to_date(#{map.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by sp.id,sp.proj_name,sp.proj_code,sp.proj_intro,sp.sort,sp.createTime,sp.updateTime order by sp.sort
